translations.cv.landing.jobs.2.key-points.0: Managed and provided technical leadership to 4 front-end development teams.
translations.cv.landing.jobs.2.key-points.1: Played a key role in scaling the company's engineering organization.
translations.cv.landing.jobs.2.key-points.2: Defined and implemented front-end development standards and best practices.
translations.cv.landing.jobs.2.key-points.4: Actively participated in design reviews using Figma.
translations.cv.landing.jobs.2.key-points.5: Mentored and developed junior and mid-level developers.
translations.cv.landing.jobs.1.title: Front-End Team Lead
translations.cv.landing.jobs.1.key-points.0: Established NX monorepo for front-end projects.

translations.cv.landing.jobs.1.key-points.3: Architected the main Angular App as a micro-front-end project.
translations.cv.landing.jobs.1.key-points.4: Led code reviews, and task assignments, and mentored junior developers.

translations.cv.landing.projects.scribo: Explore Scribo and share your stories with the world.
translations.sc.landing.title: Welcome to Scribo: Share Your Stories with the World
translations.sc.landing.subtitle: Scribo is your personal space to create, share, and connect through the power of written articles. Whether you're an aspiring writer or a seasoned expert, Scribo provides the platform you need to express your ideas.
translations.sc.landing.features.title: Explore the Features
translations.sc.landing.features.cards.effortlessCrea: Craft your thoughts and ideas into compelling articles with our intuitive editor. Supports rich text formatting and easy media embedding.
translations.sc.landing.features.cards.seamlessReadin: Enjoy a clean and distraction-free reading environment. Discover new articles and engage with content that matters to you.
translations.sc.landing.features.cards.organizedManag: Easily manage your published articles. Update, edit, or remove your content whenever you need with our user-friendly interface.
translations.sc.landing.features.cards.personalizedPr: Create your own profile to showcase your articles and connect with other writers and readers on the platform.
translations.sc.landing.features.cards.realTimeCollab: Collaborate with other writers in real-time on articles, fostering teamwork and enhancing the creative process. (Coming Soon)
translations.sc.landing.features.cards.robustSearch.d: Easily find the articles you are looking for with our powerful search feature. Filter by keywords, authors, and categories.
translations.sc.landing.cta.title: Ready to Start Sharing?
translations.sc.landing.cta.subtitle: Join our community of writers and readers today!
translations.sc.layout.footer.title: - Your platform to share your stories.
